attributes.action: TV movies/films with censored scenes should be clearly labelled as censored.
attributes.additional_details:
Ever sit down to watch a movie/film on one of the TV channels only to find out afterwards that the scenes you've been looking forward to have been censored? I'm pretty sure this applies to the overwhelming majority of adults in this country.
It would be a great boon to the public if the broadcasters had to make viewers aware that a movie/film to be broadcast has censored scenes.
